allmaps.name: allmaps
allmaps.description: Enables the ability to see every map via /map without needing the key items. Also works for viewing map waypoints.
allmaps.author: atom0s

aspect.name: aspect
aspect.description: Simple addon to better handle the aspect ratio of the game. Allows for non-standard ratios not available via the in-game configuration.
aspect.author: atom0s

cfhblock.name: cfhblock
cfhblock.description: Blocks any and all forms of calling for help to prevent accidents. This addon blocks the call for help packet from ever being sent.
cfhblock.author: atom0s

ChangeCall.name: ChangeCall
ChangeCall.description: Allows users to override all incoming calls with a new one instead.
ChangeCall.author: atom0s

chatmon.name: chatmon
chatmon.description: Plays sounds as a reaction to certain events in chat. (And some other helpful events.)
chatmon.author: atom0s

Checker.name: Checker
Checker.description:
Overrides the response displayed when checking a monster for its difficulty. Colorizes the message based on the type (easy prey, tough, etc.). Also includes displaying monsters levels (including NMs). 
 For NM levels to show, you must widescan first!
Checker.author: atom0s & Lolwutt

clock.name: clock
clock.description: Allows the player to display various times on screen..
clock.author: atom0s

config.name: config
config.description: Enables slash commands to force-set game settings directly.
config.author: atom0s

craftmon.name: craftmon
craftmon.description: Craftmon is an addon that is able to display the players craft result immediately after starting the synth. It will print out a colored message based on the result. (Normal Quality, High-Quality, or Break)
craftmon.author: atom0s

distance.name: distance
distance.description: Displays the distance between you and your target.
distance.author: atom0s

drawdistance.name: drawdistance
drawdistance.description: Allows the player to alter the rendering distances of the game via slash commands.
drawdistance.author: atom0s

enternity.name: enternity
enternity.description: Removes the need to press enter during cutscenes and other dialog.
enternity.author: Hypnotoad

equipmon.name: equipmon
equipmon.description: Displays the players equipment onscreen at all times.
equipmon.author: atom0s

filterless.name: filterless
filterless.description: Removes the bad language chat filter by force. (Useful for private servers as the client settings are not properly saved.)
filterless.author: atom0s

filters.name: filters
filters.description: Allows players to save and load chat filter settings with ease.
filters.author: atom0s

fps.name: fps
fps.description: Displays and manipulates the games framerate handling.
fps.author: atom0s

hideconsole.name: hideconsole
hideconsole.description: Hides the boot loader used for private servers.
hideconsole.author: atom0s

IME.name: IME
IME.description: IME is an addon that enables the Japanese IME toolbar on any language client. This allows you to type in Japanese regardless of what language your client is set to.
IME.author: atom0s

ImGui Style.name: ImGui Style
ImGui Style.description: Allows players to customize the overall UI system theme.
ImGui Style.author: atom0s

instantah.name: instantah
instantah.description: Get the results from your auction house purchase attempts instantly. No more delay waiting to find out if you won an item or not!
instantah.author: atom0s

links.name: links
links.description: A small addon to capture and display links in a UI window that allows you to easily open them via the click of a button.
links.author: atom0s

Logs.name: Logs
Logs.description: Creates log files of all incoming text to the players game client. Log files are named per-character and date they are written to for ease of management.
Logs.author: atom0s

luashitacast.name: luashitacast
luashitacast.description: A lua-based equipment swapping system for Ashita
luashitacast.author: Thorny

macrofix.name: macrofix
macrofix.description: An addon that alters how the macro bars show in game. Removes the delay and instead shows the bars immediately. (Original application and full credit goes to Sorien. Converted to an Ashita addon by atom0s.)
macrofix.author: atom0s

petinfo.name: petinfo
petinfo.description: Displays information about the players pet in a simple UI window.
petinfo.author: atom0s

recast.name: recast
recast.description: Displays the players ability and spell recast information.
recast.author: atom0s

sexchange.name: sexchange
sexchange.description: Allows players to change their race and hair style easily via packets.
sexchange.author: atom0s

singlerace.name: singlerace
singlerace.description: A simple addon to force all other players to a specific race.
singlerace.author: atom0s

stfu.name: stfu
stfu.description: Stfu is an addon that blocks annoying system messages that can often times spam the chat log. It will also convert 's to (call) instead to remove annoying macros.
stfu.author: atom0s

timers.name: timers
timers.description: Displays the duration of spells and abilities you've used
timers.author: The Mystic

timestamp.name: timestamp
timestamp.description: Adds a timestamp to chat messages.
timestamp.author: atom0s

tparty.name: tparty
tparty.description: Displays party member TP amounts and target health percent.
tparty.author: atom0s

HXUI.name: HXUI
HXUI.description: A massive UI overhaul for almost every UI element on your screen.
HXUI.author: HXUI Team

NoLock.name: NoLock
NoLock.description: Allows you to engage/disengage without animation lock from effects such as spells being cast on you or mob TP moves.
NoLock.author: WinterSolstice8

TargetLines.name: TargetLines
TargetLines.description: FFXII style combat lines for FFXI.
TargetLines.author: Jyouya

HardwareMouse.name: HardwareMouse
HardwareMouse.description: Force-enables a hardware mouse cursor for the game client. (Useful for those using proxies such as dgVoodoo 2 that mess up the cursor.)
HardwareMouse.author: atom0s

LegacyAC.name: LegacyAC
LegacyAC.description: Older version of Ashitacast ported from Av3 using XML
LegacyAC.author: Thorny

Minimap.name: Minimap
Minimap.description: Displays a minimap of the current area on-screen. Includes various configurations to customize the minimap and its features.
Minimap.author: atom0s

Nameplate.name: Nameplate
Nameplate.description: Corrects rendering issues in the nameplate.
Nameplate.author: Velyn

PacketFlow.name: PacketFlow
PacketFlow.description: Sends update requests the to server at a higher rate.
PacketFlow.author: Thorny

Shorthand.name: Shorthand
Shorthand.description: A plugin to allow more flexible typed commands.
Shorthand.author: ThornyFFXI

Toon.name: Toon
Toon.description: Adds toon shading to the game.
Toon.author: atom0s

3.name: Console Key
3.description: Key used for opening the client's console.
3.author: None

6.name: Enable seeding installer
6.description: Help us by uploading the game install to other players. (Your download comes from other players too!)
6.author: Flam

7.name: Throttle installation upload speed (KB/s)
7.description: Throttle your max upload speed to help us spread the installer to other players.
7.author: Flam

8.name: Ashita and POL Language
8.description: Contains configuration settings used to determine which language data is used for defaults.
8.author: atom0s

horizonmusic.name: Horizon XI Music
horizonmusic.description: Custom music for FFXI by members of the HorizonXI team.
horizonmusic.author: HorizonXI

xiview.name: XIView
xiview.description: FFXI UI & Icon Changes. Modified by HorizonXI.
xiview.author: KenshiDRK
